ch0246_90_beet/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I was wondering
who it was.
ch0246_90_beet/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m heading out to train soon. You can join me
if you want.
ch0246_90_beet/7101_0701_01_10:
I often hear that you can learn a lot from losing.
But that won’t do for me.
ch0246_90_beet/7101_0701_02_10: If I lost, it would tarnish my name and reputation.
ch0246_90_beet/7101_0701_03_10:
Instead of experiencing humiliating defeat,
I prefer getting stronger while basking in the
glory of victory.
ch0246_90_beet/7102_0701_01_10:
How do you like this outfit? The design is elegant
and refined... It’s perfect for me, because I’m cool.
ch0246_90_beet/7102_0701_02_10:
I’ll have this on when I show the world just how
strong the new Bede has become!
ch0246_90_beet/7103_0701_01_10:
Galarian Articuno has a cold and callous
personality, but its mannerisms are refined.
ch0246_90_beet/7103_0701_02_10: I find that appealing. Don’t you?
ch0246_90_beet/7103_0701_03_10:
A proud Legendary Pokémon is clearly the perfect
partner for me!
ch0246_90_beet/7104_0701_01_10:
Once I am the strongest Trainer and my name
is more widely known...
ch0246_90_beet/7104_0701_02_10:
I’m sure many people will want to raise Fairy-
and Psychic-type Pokémon.
ch0246_90_beet/7104_0701_03_10:
That would make me very happy indeed.
However...
ch0246_90_beet/7104_0701_04_10:
No matter how many challengers come to face me,
I won’t give up the top spot.
ch0246_90_beet/7105_0701_01_10:
In order to get stronger than I am now, I’ll need
your cooperation, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0246_90_beet/7105_0701_02_10:
When I challenge you to a serious battle, the only
answer you should give me...
ch0246_90_beet/1701_0701_01_10:
I was reorganizing my items and found some
extras. You can have this.
ch0246_90_beet/1701_0702_01_10:
If the mood strikes me, I’ll give you another
present later.
ch0246_90_beet/2501_0701_01_10:
Fairy- and Psychic-type Pokémon are very
compatible.
ch0246_90_beet/2501_0701_02_10:
They can support each other by covering each
other’s weaknesses with their strengths.
ch0246_90_beet/2501_0701_03_10:
I don’t think the lineup I use will be taken
down easily, as I use both types.
ch0246_90_beet/2501_0702_01_10:
If I also master Psychic-type Pokémon, I could
help Ms. Opal with—
ch0246_90_beet/2501_0702_02_10: Oh, never mind. Forget I said anything.
ch0246_90_beet/2511_0701_01_10:
There are so many meddlesome people here on
Pasio. Honestly, it’s such a pain.
ch0246_90_beet/2511_0701_02_10:
Ignoring them after seeing they’re in trouble
would only leave a bad taste in my mouth.
ch0246_90_beet/2511_0702_01_10:
I’d much rather have a straight path to being the
best, but I’ve gotten thrown off track and have
had to do many things in roundabout ways.
ch0246_90_beet/2511_0702_02_10:
Strangely enough, that doesn’t make me
feel terrible.
ch0246_90_beet/3001_0701_01_10:
Time is limited, which is why it’s important to
wake up early and not waste it.
ch0246_90_beet/3003_0701_01_10:
I suppose chatting with you will be a bit of a
breather from battling.
ch0246_90_beet/3005_0701_01_10:
Battling at night is nothing like during the day.
Care to try?
